A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: An ok movie\, not the end game (best) of all Star Wars Movies as rumured. To many holes in the story and to many scenarios that lead to another scenario\, fight\, run\, hide\, escape\, then its fight\, run\, hide and escape again\, over and over again. Scenes seemed scattered and I often wished the movie would just end already. I gave it 3 stars for the humor\, some scenes were funny as heck! If the movie was a touch darker I would have enjoyed it more.
